actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to offset the loss in tax revenues incurred by Guam and the Virgin Islands by reason of certain Federal tax reductions.

summary.text: Provides for supplementary payments to Guam and the Virgin Islands to offset losses in tax revenues due to the enactment of the Tax Reduction Act of 1975, the Revenue Adjustment Act of 1975, the Tax Reform Act of 1976, the Tax Reduction and Simplification Act of 1977, and the Revenue Act of 1978.

titles.title: A bill to offset the loss in tax revenues incurred by Guam and the Virgin Islands by reason of certain Federal tax reductions.
